amendment.description: Page 7, after line 5, insert the following: (9) The Paris Agreement is a treaty and should be treated as a treaty. Therefore, before any action can be taken to execute the goals in the Paris Agreement, the Senate should approve a resolution of advice and consent to ratification of the Paris Agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings that the Paris Agreement is a treaty and should be treated as such.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 176).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 176).
